QuestData.Title: Nemesis: Orcslayer
QuestData.Description: <Kuros hands you the bloody heart.>$B$BThe ritual is complete. Your nemesis is marked for death.$B$BNow your work to rid this world of the enemy truly begins. Kill all orcs that stand defiantly against the Alliance. Let their deaths serve as a warning to the rest of the Horde: they will leave Draenor or they will die.$B$BReturn when you have quenched your rage with the blood of orc.$B$BConquer our enemy and be known as orcslayer. Fail and be nothing.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 500 Orc Players in Player versus Player combat across Draenor.
